title: [Whistler's Pass, Mountain Ledge]
description: The trail hugs closer to the looming wall as the mountain ledge narrows to the merest shelf.  Over the brink, a vast and limitless darkness yawns beneath the starry sky.

The trail hugs closer to the looming wall as the mountain ledge narrows to the merest shelf.  Over the brink, a thick forest runs like a verdant carpet to the horizon--though most travelers prefer to keep their eyes on the ground beneath their feet.
